sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Message from '../components/Message' import { getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderActions' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import PrintProvider, { Print } from 'react-easy-print' function OrderScreen({ match }) { const orderId = match.params.id const dispatch = useDispatch() var content = document.getElementById("print") var pri = document.getElementById("ifmcontentstoprint").contentWindow pri.document.open(); pri.document.write(content.innerHTML) pri.document.close() pri.focus() pri.print() const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) const { order, error, loading } = orderDetails if(!loading && !error){ order.itemsPrice = order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) } useEffect(() => { if(!order || order._id !== Number(orderId)){ dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) } }, [order, orderId]) return loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

Order Number: {order._id}

Name: { order.user.name}

Email: { order.user.email}

Shipping Address: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '}

Mobile Number: {order.shippingAddress.number}

{order.isDelivered ? ( Delivered on {order.paidAt} ) : ( Your Product is not delivered )}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

{order.isPaid ? ( Paid on {order.paidAt} ) : ( Not Paid (Please Pay Soon) )}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? You have no order. : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Item: ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${order.shippingPrice} Tax: ${order.taxPrice} Total: ${order.totalPrice}
) } export default OrderScreen
